events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising with relevant skills and experiences.
The application has been categorised under Engineering since the candidateâ€™s background primarily includes software development and coding expertise.
Assigned our recruiter specialized in technical roles to manage this application and coordinate next steps with the candidate.
Conducted an initial phone screening where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software engineering fundamentals and relevant project experience.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for proceeding to the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate on May 10th, allocating time slots with the engineering panel for a comprehensive assessment.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding skills during the live coding session.
The HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture fit and benefits package with the candidate following the positive technical interview results.
Candidate completed the HR interview and expressed a clear interest in the company's values and vision, aligning well with the role.
Extended a formal offer to the candidate including salary, benefits, and start date options, highlighting the strong alignment with their expectations.
Received positive feedback from the candidate regarding the offer, with only minor questions about remote work policies.
The candidate has accepted the offer enthusiastically and confirmed their intended start date with our onboarding team.
Onboarding process has begun with setting up accounts, equipment delivery, and initial training scheduled to onboard the new software engineer successfully.
The hiring process is now officially closed with the candidate successfully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
